answers.content_html: White light and an emission spectrum are different varieties of continuous distribution of frequencies.
answers.feedback_html: An emission spectrum is a series of discrete frequencies.

answers.content_html: White light and an emission spectrum are different series of discrete frequencies.
answers.feedback_html: White light is a continuous distribution of frequencies.

answers.content_html: White light is a continuous distribution of frequencies, and an emission spectrum is a series of discrete frequencies.
answers.feedback_html: Recall the composition of white light and the composition of an emission spectrum.

answers.content_html: White light is a series of discrete frequencies, and an emission spectrum is a continuous distribution of frequencies.
answers.feedback_html: Descriptions of white light and emission spectrum are exchanged.

stem_html: Why does the emission spectrum of an isolated gas differ from the emission spectrum created by a white light?
